titleStmt.title: New-Englands sence, of Old-England and Jrelands sorrowes a sermon preached upon a day of generall humiliation in the churches of New-England : in the behalfe of Old-England and Jrelands sad condition / by William Hooke ...
titleStmt.author: Hooke, William, 1600 or 1601-1678.

notesStmt.note: Preached probably on April 14, 1642.--cf. JCB, 1919, II, 331, and Church 470.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
